flawed_nl_solution:
Of the under-30s there for the second band, 40% are men because 100-60=<<100-60=50>>50
There are fifty under-30s there for the second band because 20 / 0.5 = <<20/0.5=40>>40
There are 100 people there to see the second band because 40 / 0.5 = <<40/0.5=80>>80
There are 150 people at the concert because 80 / (2/3) = <<80/(2/3)=120>>120
#### 120

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
